title: Password Reset
content: Users can reset their password by going to Settings > Security > Password Reset. A verification email is sent and the reset link is valid for 24 hours.

title: Account Verification
content: All new accounts must verify their email address. The verification link expires in 7 days. Check your spam folder if you do not see the email.

title: Subscription Plans
content: We offer Basic, Pro, and Enterprise plans. Basic is 9 USD per month, Pro is 29 USD per month and Enterprise is 99 USD per month with custom SLAs.

title: API Rate Limits
content: Basic plan has 100 requests per minute, Pro plan has 1000 requests per minute. Enterprise plans can negotiate higher limits. Exceeding limits returns HTTP 429.

title: Support
content: For standard support, email support@company.com with a 48 hour response time. Pro and Enterprise customers can use support-priority@company.com for a 4 hour response.

title: Billing
content: Update your payment method under Settings > Billing. For invoice questions or failed payments, contact billing@company.com.

title: Data Privacy
content: We do not use your conversations to train external models. Logs are stored for 30 days for debugging and then deleted.

title: Feature Requests
content: Feature requests can be submitted from the in-app Feedback page. High-impact requests from Pro and Enterprise users are prioritized.
